About the Company: Aryaman Broking Ltd. provides merchant banking services for the corporate sector in India. It offers services in the areas of initial public offering, takeovers, debt syndication, merger and acquisition advisory, and rights issue. The companys services include structuring of means of finance of a project; issue management of equity/debt instruments; acting as a manager for takeovers/buybacks/delisting; underwriting and private placement of shares with FIIs/NRIs/mutual funds/FIs/HNIs, and banks; corporate strategy formulation for growth through diversification and expansion by identifying latent potential etc. It is the subsidiary company of Aryaman Financial Services Ltd.
